title: I need to decipher my Huawei hg8245h modem sip phone password [closed]
content:
Closed. This question is off-topic. It is not currently accepting answers. Questions asking for help reverse-engineering a specific system are off-topic unless they demonstrate an understanding of the concepts involved and clearly identify a specific problem. Closed 1 year ago. Improve this question I have a Huawei hg8245h modem and unfortunately, I have forgotten my sip phone password and my ISP does not provide it to me. I have downloaded the modem configuration and this is the section related to the SIP password:
I have tried to use this tool to decipher with no success: https://andreluis034.github.io/huawei-utility-page/#cipher Can someone decipher this password for me or give me help to dicpher it?

answers_data.content:
You can use the tool mentioned here: https://github.com/hu60t/hu60wap6/files/6206916/Huawei.configuration.encryption.and.decryption.tools.zip
Reference: https://gist.github.com/staaldraad/605a5e40abaaa5915bc7

comments.text: Hello and welcome to re.se! In the current state - your answer is a link only answer. If the link goes down - this answer wouldn't be relevant. I'd recommend adding a summary of the solution you mention in the link.
